'''Stone brick stairs''' are a [[stone brick]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Stone brick stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Stone Brick Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|link=none
|item=1
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Stone brick stairs generate as a part of cold [[ocean ruins]], [[ruined portal]]s in the [[Overworld]], and [[stronghold]]s.
